mapper.select: select s.id, s.ceo_id as `ceoId`, s.br_filename as `brFilename`, s.name, s.lon, s.lat, s.tel, s.open_ended as `openEnded`, s.unmanned, s.delivery, s.atm, s.sell_wine as `sellWine`, s.sell_coffee as `sellCoffee`, s.smoothieking, s.apple_acc as `appleAcc`, s.toto, s.address from product p, store_product sp, store s where p.id = sp.product_id and sp.store_id = s.id and p.id = #{id}

select id, name, lon, lat, tel, address, open_ended as `openEnded`, unmanned, delivery, atm, sell_wine as `sellWine`, sell_coffee as `sellCoffee`, smoothieking, apple_acc as `appleAcc`, toto from store

select id, name, lon, lat, tel, address, open_ended as `openEnded`, unmanned, delivery, atm, sell_wine as `sellWine`, sell_coffee as `sellCoffee`, smoothieking, apple_acc as `appleAcc`, toto from store where name like concat('%', #{storeName}, '%')
